hero.title: Global Trade, Local Trust
hero.subtitle: Fjord Import connects you with reliable suppliers and clients across Europe, Asia, and beyond.

cards.title: Import & Export
cards.desc: We handle international logistics, compliance, and coordination for your global trade needs.

cards.title: Customs Handling
cards.desc: Let us take care of customs clearance, documentation, and duty regulations.

cards.title: B2B Logistics
cards.desc: From warehouses to delivery, we ensure smooth B2B transport operations end-to-end.

about.title: Who We Are
about.desc: With over a decade of experience in international trade, we are a trusted partner for businesses looking to streamline import/export operations. We bridge the gap between supply and demand, across continents.
